long_description: lmcs has a dedicated department to provide services for companies to help them comply with the driven machinery regulations. load mass crane services is a dynamic south african company specialising in providing quality products and services to the crane and lifting industry. we sell and manufacture products that conform to the highest quality and industry standards and we are geared and certified to help companies comply with the legal requirements and conditions of the driven machinery regulations, 2015 of the occupational health and safety act. servicing and repairs to all makes of cranes and hoists. a customer is the most important component of our company's existence. we are the appointed coastal distributors for swf krantechnik who manufacture and supply class-leading crane kits and hoist components. components that cannot be manufactured in our workshops locally are sourced from our associates and importers. lmcs is registered with the lifting equipment engineering association of south africa and the dept. of labour.
